title.rendered: Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds

content.rendered:
A Tantalising Journey Of Flavours With Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds

Genetic Lineage: Auto Lemon Skunk x Cream Cookies Strain

🧬 Genetic Fusion: Tantalise your taste buds with the delightful fusion of Auto Lemon Skunk and Cream Cookies strains, creating a symphony of cookie sweetness and tangy lemon in every puff.

🌿 Balanced Hybrid Strain: With a harmonious 60% Indica and 40% Sativa composition, these feminized cannabis seeds yield plants that grow to a height of 60-160 cm. Indoors, they flower in a mere 6-8 weeks, promising up to 400 g/m² of citrusy goodness. Outdoors, expect a bountiful harvest within 10-11 weeks.

🍯 Tangy Terpenes: Immerse yourself in the zesty world of lemon meringue with a terpene profile featuring Alpha Cedrene, Alpha Pinene, Beta Caryophyllene, Borneol, Cadinene, Camphene, Citral, Eugenol, Farnesene, Fenchol, Humulene, Myrcene, and Ocimene.

🌬️ Potency and Pleasure: With a THC content of 23%, these autoflowering feminized seeds offer a swift, euphoric high. The delightful tang of lemon meringue pairs perfectly with the cerebral relaxation.

📜 Legal Note: Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds sold as souvenirs in compliance with cannabis seeds UK laws.

🌍 Worldwide Availability: Wherever you are, embark on a journey of unforgettable flavour and effects with Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Autoflowering Feminized Seeds.

🌐 Find a distributor near you and savour the citrusy delights of Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Auto flowering feminized seeds!

Description:

Elevate your cannabis journey with Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds. A true delight for enthusiasts seeking a burst of flavour and invigorating effects. Crafted from the harmonious union of Auto Lemon Skunk and Cream Cookies strain boasts exceptional genetics and a taste that awakens your senses. Its 60% Indica and 40% Sativa blend offer a harmonious experience, making it a versatile choice for both relaxation and inspiration.

 

Flavour & Aroma Of Our Lemon Meringue Strain:

Prepare to embark on a flavourful adventure with our Lemon Meringue Strain effects. Inhale the tantalising combination of cookie sweetness and tangy lemon that dances on your palate. This strain delivers an unforgettable citrusy delight with hints of creamy vanilla. It’s a dessert-like experience that elevates your cannabis journey.

 

What Strain Is Lemon Meringue Auto?

Lemon Meringue strain is a captivating hybrid seed created from the genetic fusion of Auto Lemon Skunk and our Cream Cookies strain. This combination results in a balanced yet potent strain that offers a delightful blend of flavours and effects, appealing to both seasoned enthusiasts and newcomers.

 

Potency & Effects:

Experience the potency of the Lemon Meringue strain with its 60% Indica genetics. It delivers a soothing yet uplifting high that’s perfect for unwinding after a long day. Feel the stress melt away as you indulge in its calming effects, leaving you with a sense of tranquillity and inspiration.

 

Cultivation Of Lemon Meringue Strain:

Growing Lemon Meringue Strain is a rewarding experience for cultivators of all levels. With a manageable height, both indoor and outdoor growers can flourish. It boasts a short flowering time of 6-8 weeks indoors and a swift 10-11 weeks to harvest. You can anticipate a bountiful yield of up to 400 g/m² indoors and 50-160 g/plant outdoors. Cultivate your own Lemon Meringue garden and relish the enticing aroma of this citrusy sensation.

 

Legal Note:

Please be mindful that Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds are sold as collectible souvenirs only, in strict accordance with cannabis seeds UK laws. Cherish these seeds as tokens of your cannabis journey and embark on the flavourful world of our Lemon Meringue strain.

🚚 Free U.K Shipping With International Options Available

🍋Dive into Citrus Bliss with Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Strain Autoflower Seeds🍰

Crafted from the genetic fusion of Auto Lemon Skunk (lemon skunk auto)and Cream Cookies strain, this strain delivers a remarkable blend of flavours that’s bound to leave a lasting impression. What’s more, its swift-acting high kicks in almost instantly, so prepare for a delightful, sit-down-worthy experience.

Is lemon meringue strain indica or sativa? With a balanced 60% Indica and 40% Sativa mix, Tastebudz Lemon Meringue Autoflowering cannabis seeds reach a manageable height of 60-160 cm and boast a rapid flowering time of just 6-8 weeks indoors. You can anticipate a generous yield of up to 400 g/m² indoors and 50-160 g/plant outdoors, with harvest time approaching in only 10-11 weeks. This strain boasts a THC content of 23%, ensuring a potent and enjoyable ride.
